name: Kisume Game
description:
Simple Dodging Touhou Fan Game.

Kisume is the main protagonist of this game.

Story:

Apples has been blown away from inside the underworld through the dark blowhole cave. Kisume ate one apple and takes a liking to it immediately. Now she wants to collect 1 Million apples and eat all of it at once. Help Kisume reach her dream!

Yamame will give you useful bonuses if you give her apples too. (Not fully implemented)

Goal: Eat 1,000,000 apples.

To be Added:

  • Yamame's Shop
  • Options
  • Title Screen BGM
  • In Game BG
  • More obstacles and powerups
